description:
All is quiet in the dukedom as the Germanian army redirects its forces to deal with a costal invasion by the allied forces.  But the silence is suddenly broken by a deadly feint attack, and Izetta is sent to save the day.  But when she arrives, she`s met with another Witch!  Who is this new witch, and can Izetta defeat her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゼルン回廊, 燃ゆ Der Sellun-Korridor brennt nieder
